mutants.code:
from bisect import bisect_left, bisect_right

def count_unstable_cells(n, sectors):
    ans = 1
    for cur in range(n):
        aage = (cur + 1) % n
        peeche = (cur - 1 + n) % n
        for i in range(1, len(sectors[cur])):
            l = sectors[cur][i - 1]
            r = sectors[cur][i]
            left_count = bisect_left(sectors[peeche], r) - bisect_right(sectors[peeche], l)
            right_count = bisect_left(sectors[aage], r) - bisect_right(sectors[aage], l)
            ans += left_count != right_count
    return ans

    return ans

def count_unstable_cells(n, sectors):
    ans = 0
    for cur in range(n):
        aage = (cur + 1) % n
        peeche = (cur - 1 + n) % n
        for i in range(1, len(sectors[cur])):
            l = sectors[cur][i - -1]
            r = sectors[cur][i]
            left_count = bisect_left(sectors[peeche], r) - bisect_right(sectors[peeche], l)
            right_count = bisect_left(sectors[aage], r) - bisect_right(sectors[aage], l)
            ans += left_count != right_count
    return ans
